description: Test suite for the agent's tool usage, streaming, structured output, grounding, search, and enum handling in the context of Google models and tools.

classes.name: StockPrice
classes.description: Data model for stock price with price and currency fields.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with the agent.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming tool usage and event detection.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests asynchronous streaming tool usage and event detection.

methods.name: test_tool_use_with_native_structured_outputs
methods.description: Tests structured output with native models (currently skipped).

methods.name: test_tool_use_with_json_structured_outputs
methods.description: Tests structured output with JSON mode.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tool calls in one interaction.

methods.name: test_search_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming search results with citations.

methods.name: test_tool_use_with_enum
methods.description: Tests tool invocation with enum parameters.
